page.title: 05Employment in Ringstead.
page.content: Today the following provide employment for some of the villagers:-shops,farms,a toy factory,a firm producing animal food,a gravel pit working and a riding school.The rest of the working population has to find work elsewhere. A questionaire was sent to the homes of the children attending Ringstead School.From the 71 returned the following statistics were compiled. 71 men and 45 women were employed.The men all worked full-time but 30 women worked part-time.Only 4 men work in the village and 67 travel a distance ranging from 2kms to 400kms. Of the women, 15 work in Ringstead and only 10 travel more than 30kms.
